sentences.english: The litter amount and the maximum water-holding capacity is large in the Selective-cutting Zone at lower cutting intensity.

sentences.english: Simultaneously, a rotation system is in place for lumbering bases so as to help restore vegetation.
sentences.chinese: 同時，對採伐基地進行及時更新，恢復森林植被。

sentences.english: There might even be an agreement to stop deforestation.
sentences.chinese: 甚至有可能達成停止採伐森林的協議。

sentences.english: The paper gives dissertation on the existing problems in wood cutting management from many angles.

sentences.english: The impact of amazonian deforestation on dry season rainfall.

sentences.english: Finally, the research orientation of the future in China was pointed out.
sentences.chinese: 指出今後中國森林生態採伐更新研究的方向。

sentences.english: It now covers the produce of illegal logging as well.

sentences.english: Before we could build we had to fire bricks and carry timber from the forests.

sentences.english: Its causes range from selective logging and burning, to periodic harvesting of firewood.
sentences.chinese: 它的原因包括從選擇性砍伐和焚燒到定期採伐木柴。

sentences.english: The Ming Dynasty, the wood is valued by the Royal and began a large-scale logging.

sentences.english: The rest of the deforested areas had not yet been put to use.

sentences.english: Waitutu Forest to meet local people and be aware of the clear-felling.
sentences.chinese: 在崴圖圖森林裏會見當地土著和了解清除採伐的意義。

sentences.english: We investigate and expose the trade in illegal and destructively logged timber.
sentences.chinese: 我們調查和揭露非法採伐和破壞性採伐木材的貿易。

sentences.english: The government has allowed the clear-cutting of trees in some logging regions of Oregon.
